title: Can this video card play League of Legends with good fps and graphics quality?
body:
Hi, I am planning to buy a new computer for mainly homework/research use, as well a some LOL gaming. The specs for my computer has :
Acer Aspire AT3-710-EB51 Desktop 
- Intel Core i7-6700 3.4GHz, 12GB DDR3, 2TB HDD 
- NVIDIA GTX 745 4GB Graphics 
- Windows 10 Home 64-bit.

I was wondering if these specs and the video card can run LOL pretty well, with high FPS and good video quality. If anyone can answer or help me, that would be great! Thanks!

replies.body: Easily can run game on high/max settings with good frames

Hey there,

On max settings according to a benchmark these seem to be the framerates you could expect with that card.

FPS: MIN 70, MAX 150, AVG 111
